titles.title: To extend the effectiveness of an exemption from the requirements of the Depository Institution Management Interlocks Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 11/8/1993--Introduced. Amends the Depository Institution Management Interlocks Act to repeal the 15-year expiration date for exemptions from its requirements regarding the service of certain management officials.
